name: The Glass Pool of Berrandas
description:
The Glass Pool of Berrandas

Can you reach The Glass Pool of Berrandas?

 

What lies beneath its murky depths?

 

Can you find the stones that unlock what lies beneath?

 

A text-based adventure, set in on a fantasy isle.

 

With artwork by Lewis Fox 

Made for Bandersnatch Jam 2019

Made in Twine, powered by Harlowe.

a From the Chasm production, 2019.
